title: Danny Gardiner
text:
Robert "Danny" Gardiner (third ¼ 1939 – 14 January 2015) was an English professional <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> footballer who played in the 1960s and 1970s. He played at representative level for <a href="Great%20Britain%20national%20rugby%20league%20team">Great Britain</a> and <a href="Lancashire%20rugby%20league%20team">Lancashire</a>, and at club level for <a href="Millom%20ARLFC">Millom ARLFC</a>, <a href="Workington%20Town">Workington Town</a>, <a href="Wigan%20Warriors">Wigan</a> (<a href="List%20of%20Wigan%20Warriors%20players">Heritage № 634</a>) and <a href="Oldham%20R.L.F.C.">Oldham</a> (<a href="List%20of%20Oldham%20R.L.F.C.%20players">Heritage № 724</a>) as a or .
Background.
Danny Gardiner was born in <a href="Kirkby-in-Furness">Kirkby-in-Furness</a>, <a href="Lancashire">Lancashire</a>, England (birth registered in <a href="Ulverston">Ulverston</a> district, <a href="Lancashire">Lancashire</a>, England).
Playing career.
International honours.
Danny Gardiner won a <a href="Cap%20%28sport%29">cap</a> for <a href="Great%20Britain%20national%20rugby%20league%20team">Great Britain</a> while at Wigan in 1965 against New Zealand.
Challenge Cup Final appearances.
Danny Gardiner played left-, i.e. number 8, in <a href="Wigan%20Warriors">Wigan</a>'s 20-16 victory over <a href="Hunslet%20R.L.F.C.">Hunslet</a> in the <a href="1965%20Challenge%20Cup">1965</a> <a href="Challenge%20Cup">Challenge Cup</a> Final during the <a href="1964%E2%80%9365%20Northern%20Rugby%20Football%20League%20season%23Challenge%20Cup">1964–65 season</a> at <a href="Wembley%20Stadium%20%281923%29">Wembley Stadium</a>, <a href="London">London</a> on Saturday 8 May 1965, in front of a crowd of 89,016.
County Cup Final appearances.
Danny Gardiner played left-, i.e. number 8, in <a href="Wigan%20Warriors">Wigan</a>'s 16-13 victory over <a href="Oldham%20R.L.F.C.">Oldham</a> in the <a href="1966%20Lancashire%20Cup">1966</a> <a href="RFL%20Lancashire%20Cup">Lancashire</a> <a href="Rugby%20league%20county%20cups">County Cup</a> Final during the <a href="1966%E2%80%9367%20Northern%20Rugby%20Football%20League%20season">1966–67 season</a> at <a href="Station%20Road%2C%20Swinton">Station Road, Swinton</a>, on Saturday 29 October 1966.
Genealogical information.
Danny Gardiner was the older brother of the rugby league footballer who played in the 1960s for <a href="Workington%20Town">Workington Town</a> (<a href="Reserve%20team">A-Team</a> plus 4-matches during the <a href="1964%E2%80%9365%20Northern%20Rugby%20Football%20League%20season">1964–65 season</a>); <a href="John%20Gardiner%20%28rugby%20league%29">John</a> <a href="Eric%20Gardiner">Eric Gardiner</a> (birth registered second ¼ in <a href="Ulverston">Ulverston</a> district, <a href="Lancashire">Lancashire</a>, England).
